wikipedia_page.main: William Waller (1898 – after 1923) was an English professional association footballer who played as an inside forward. He played in the Football League for Nelson, Burnley and Queens Park Rangers.

response: *Sir William Waller (c. 1597–1668), English Parliamentary general during the English Civil War
*Sir William Waller (informer) (died 1699), Middlesex justice and politician
